strings.fieldReportConstantVisibilityIFRCandNSTo: Available to only those with an active IFRC account or NS assignment
strings.fieldReportConstantVisibilityIFRCSecreta: Available to only those with an active IFRC account
strings.fieldReportConstantVisibilityPublicToolt: Available to all stakeholders on the GO platform
strings.fieldReportConstantVisibilityRCRCMovemen: Available to those who have an IFRC GO login across the RCRC Movement
strings.fieldReportFormResponseLabel: Planned International Response (Indicate status of global and regional tools.)
strings.fieldReportFormVisibilityLabel: This field report is visible to
strings.fieldsStep4ContactRowsFederationContactE: IFRC staff who is overall responsible for supporting the NS in its response to the disaster event.
strings.fieldsStep4ContactRowsFederationContactL: IFRC Focal Point for the Emergency
strings.fieldsStep4ContactRowsMediaContactEVTEPI: An IFRC secretariat media contact in Geneva/Region or Country.
strings.fieldsStep4ContactRowsNSContactEVTEPIDes: The most senior staff in the National Society responsible and knowledgeable about the disaster event.
strings.fieldsStep4ContactRowsOriginatorEVTEPIEW: NS or IFRC Staff completing the Field Report.
